ygData.subject: RE: Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you. Do you have any info on what skill level is required for the different pieces of banded? Jeff
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you. Do you have any info on what skill level is required for the
different pieces of banded?

Jeff

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Curtis Beck [SMTP:jungle@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 10:35 AM
> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Questions
>
> From: Curtis Beck <jungle@...>
>
> Jeff,
> You can make some of the real easy banded but I suggest that
> you start making skewers to get your self up to around 112 (don't
> rembers the exact number) Then make sewing kits to 135 or so.
>
> Tanaman,(Barbarian Shaman)
> Tribunal
>
> "McConnell, Jeff" wrote:
> >
> > From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
> >
> > Hello
> > I have just returned to trade skills and smith in particular. I
> currently
> > have 70 smithing, what should I make? At what levels should I attempt
> what
> > pieces of banded?
> >
> > Silvermyst the returning smith
> >
> > > The EQ BlackSmithy Discussion Group
> > List Administrator:

>
